gameCommands.commandDescription: To MOVE from one place to another, type go plus the direction you want to go.
to examine in a specific room, type examine plus the name of the room location.
to use a specific item, type use plus the item you want to use.
to exit a room, type exit plus the name of the room location.

commandDescription: The monster is on to you so you better run!
